001import java.awt.Graphics;
002import java.awt.Graphics2D;
003import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
004import java.awt.image.AffineTransformOp;
005import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
006
007import java.lang.Math;
008/** BigAsteroid.java - A class to represent a large asteroid
009* This class features inheritence as it is a child of custom class GamePiece as required by
010* project specification a.
011* @author Daniel Andrews
012* @version Final Project
013*/
014public class BigAsteroid extends GamePiece {
015        private double x, // x and y coordination and direction
016                                   y,
017                                   direction;
018        private double speed; // Speed of asteroid
019        private double imageDirection; // Orientation of image
020
021        /** No-args Constructor sets direction of movement and image to random value
022        * This constructor is meant to be called by subclasses to inherit direction
023        */
024        public BigAsteroid() {
025                direction = Math.random() * 360; // Random values for movement and image direction
026                imageDirection = Math.random() * 360;
027        }
028
029        /** Full Constructor sets location of asteroid
030         * @param x x-coordinate for asteroid location
031         * @param y y-coordinate for asteriod location
032        */
033        public BigAsteroid(double x, double y) {
034                this.x = x; // Set x, y coordinates
035                this.y = y;
036                direction = Math.random() * 360; // Set random values for movement and image direction
037                imageDirection = Math.random() * 360;
038                speed = 1.0;
039                setImage(Asteroids.gc.getBigAsteroidImage()); // Retrieve sprite image from controller
040                setRotatedImage(getImage());
041        }
042
043        /** Sets x coordinate
044        * @param x x coordinate
045        */
046        public void xSet(double x) {
047                this.x = x;
048        }
049
050        /** Sets y coordinate
051        * @param y y coordinate
052        */
053        public void ySet(double y) {
054                this.y = y;
055        }
056
057        /** Returns x coordinate
058        * @return x coordinate
059        */
060        public double x() {
061                return x;
062        }
063
064        /** Returns y coordinate
065        * @return y coordinate
066        */
067        public double y() {
068                return y;
069        }
070
071        /** Sets direction
072        * @param direction New direction of travel
073        */
074        public void setDirection(double direction) {
075                this.direction = direction;
076        }
077
078        /** Returns direction of trave;
079        * @return Direction of travel
080        */
081        public double getDirection() {
082                return direction;
083        }
084
085        /** Sets speed
086        * @param speed New speed
087        */
088        public void setSpeed(double speed) {
089                this.speed = speed;
090        }
091
092        /** Returns speed
093        * @return Object speed
094        */
095        public double getSpeed() {
096                return speed;
097        }
098
099        /** Paints asteroid on graphics canvas
100        * @param g Graphics canvas to paint on
101        */
102        @Override
103        public void paintComponent(Graphics g) {
104                super.paintComponent(g);
105                Graphics2D g2 = (Graphics2D) g; // Cast canvas to 2d canvas
106
107                g2.drawImage(getRotatedImage(),(int) x,(int) y, this); // Draw rotated image sprite
108        }
109
110        /** Update object every frame
111        */
112        public void tick() {
113                move(); // Move object
114                imageDirection += 1; // Rotate asteroid
115                rotateImage(); // Rotate image
116                screenWrap(); // Wrap around screen
117                repaint(); // Update image on canvas
118        }
119
120        /** Returns if object is enabled
121        * @return true if object is enabled
122        */
123        public boolean isEnabled() {
124                return true;
125        }
126
127        /** Rotates the sprite image
128        */
129        public void rotateImage() {
130                double rotationRequired = Math.toRadians(imageDirection); // Find rotation needed
131                double locationX = getImage().getWidth() / 2; // Get center of asteroid
132                double locationY = getImage().getHeight() / 2;
133                AffineTransform tx = AffineTransform.getRotateInstance(rotationRequired, 
134                        locationX, locationY); // Create rotation object
135                AffineTransformOp op = new AffineTransformOp(tx, AffineTransformOp.TYPE_BILINEAR); // New transformation operation
136                BufferedImage newImage = new BufferedImage(getImage().getWidth(), getImage().getHeight(), 
137                        getImage().getType()); // Use original image to minimize distortion
138                op.filter(getImage(), newImage); // Apply rotation filter to image
139
140                setRotatedImage(newImage); // Update rotated image sprite
141        }
142
143        /** Move object based on direction and speed
144        */
145        public void move() {
146                x += Math.cos(Math.toRadians(direction)) * speed; // Calculate change in x and y based on speed and direction of travel
147                y += Math.sin(Math.toRadians(direction)) * speed;
148        }
149
150        /** Wraps bullet around screen if it exceeds game window boundaries
151        */
152        public void screenWrap() {
153                if (x > Asteroids.CANVAS_WIDTH - getImage().getWidth() / 2) {x = 0 - getImage().getWidth() / 2;} // Right wrap
154                if (x < 0 - getImage().getWidth()) {x = Asteroids.CANVAS_WIDTH - getImage().getWidth();} // Left wrap
155                if (y > Asteroids.CANVAS_HEIGHT - getImage().getHeight() / 2) {y = 0 - getImage().getHeight() / 2;} // Bottom wrap
156                if (y < 0 - getImage().getHeight()) {y = Asteroids.CANVAS_HEIGHT - getImage().getHeight();} // Top wrap
157        }
158        
159        /** Destroys object
160        */
161        public void destroy() {
162                Asteroids.gc.removeAsteroid(this); // Remove from controller
163                MediumAsteroid[] newAsteroids = {new MediumAsteroid(x, y), new MediumAsteroid(x, y)}; // Create two new medium asteroids at current location
164                Asteroids.gc.addAsteroids(newAsteroids); // Pass to game controller
165        }
166
167        /** Returns the radius of collision mask
168        * @return Radius of collision mask
169        */
170        public double getMaskRadius() {
171                return (double) getImage().getWidth() / 2; // Half of image width
172        }
173
174        /** Returns center of object
175        * @return double array representing object center
176        */
177        public double[] getCenter() {
178                double[] center = new double[2]; // Array to hold center
179                center[0] = x + (getImage().getWidth() / 2); // Center is based on center of image
180                center[1] = y + (getImage().getHeight() / 2);
181                return center;
182        }
183
184        /** Compares this object to another
185        * @param another Object to be compared
186        * @return true if objects are equal
187        */
188        public boolean equals(Object another) {
189                if (another == null) {return false;}
190                if (another.getClass() != this.getClass()) {return false;}
191                BigAsteroid other = (BigAsteroid) another;
192                return other.x() == x &&
193                           other.y() == y &&
194                           other.getSpeed() == speed &&
195                           other.getDirection() == direction;
196        }
197
198        public String toString() {
199                return "Asteroid at (" + (int) x + "," + (int) y + ") traveling at heading " + (int) direction + " at a speed of " + (int) speed;
200        }
201}
